name: The State of Black Arizona (SBAZ)
description: SBAZ offers programs like the African American Leadership Institute (AALI), which provides a transformative experience for Black leaders through masterclasses, retreats, and field experiences focused on leadership development and systemic change
services: Black-owned Management training in Arizona consultation

name: Black Chamber of Arizona (BCAZ)
description: BCAZ is an organization dedicated to strengthening small businesses and driving economic growth for Black entrepreneurs in Arizona. They offer resources, training, and networking opportunities. They also run programs like the Impact AZ business accelerator
services: Black-owned Management training in Arizona consultation

name: Local First Arizona - We Rise Business Accelerator Program
description: This program is tailored to Arizona's Black-owned businesses at all stages of development, equipping them with entrepreneurial skills and resources to thrive
services: Black-owned Management training in Arizona consultation

name: Millionaire Mastermind Academy
description: This nonprofit organization supports Black entrepreneurs and offers grants and mentorship through programs like Impact AZ, aiming to close the racial wealth gap
services: Black-owned Management training in Arizona consultation

name: Community Foundation for Southern Arizona - African American Leadership Institute (AALI)
description: This institute focuses on the individual development of African American leaders to increase their participation in civic, political, and workforce leadership roles, promoting inclusive economic growth
services: Black-owned Management training in Arizona consultation
